title: Vigilant Oversight, Measured Trust
description: BasstheWhale's extensive operation of the Consiglio's diverse properties establishes a significant, economically intertwined relationship with a high strength score (6436.23) but notably negative trust (-49.70). As the embodiment of Venetian statecraft, the Consiglio maintains vigilant, impersonal assessment of BasstheWhale's management of 11 critical properties including docks, workshops, and a parish church, focusing solely on their effectiveness in contributing to the Republic's prosperity rather than developing personal affinity.
